engagements.aiSummary: Customer inquired about product integration options and pricing for enterprise plan.
engagements.agentNotes: Customer is evaluating our platform for their team of 50+ users. Follow-up scheduled for next week.
engagements.transcript:
Customer: Hi, I need information about enterprise pricing...
Agent: I'd be happy to help you with that...

engagements.aiSummary: Technical support request regarding API authentication issues.
engagements.agentNotes: Resolved authentication problem by updating API keys. Customer confirmed working solution.
engagements.transcript: Customer reported authentication failures when calling our API...

engagements.aiSummary: Initial onboarding call to set up customer account and training session.
engagements.agentNotes: Completed account setup. Customer very satisfied with onboarding process.
engagements.transcript: Phone conversation recording available - Duration: 23 minutes

engagements.aiSummary: Customer requested feature demo and trial extension.
engagements.agentNotes: Provided comprehensive demo. Extended trial by 14 days as requested.
engagements.transcript:
Customer: Can you show me the reporting features?
Agent: Absolutely! Let me walk you through our analytics dashboard...

engagements.aiSummary: Billing inquiry about plan upgrade options.
engagements.agentNotes: Explained pricing tiers. Customer considering Professional plan upgrade.
engagements.transcript: Customer inquiry about upgrading from Basic to Professional plan...

engagements.aiSummary: Security compliance questions for enterprise deployment.
engagements.agentNotes: Discussed SOC2 compliance and security certifications. Provided compliance documentation.
engagements.transcript: Customer: We need to ensure your platform meets our security requirements...

engagements.aiSummary: Contract renewal discussion and feature requests.
engagements.agentNotes: Customer interested in annual renewal with additional user seats. Escalated to sales team.
engagements.transcript: Phone conversation recording available - Duration: 31 minutes

engagements.aiSummary: Request for custom integration with third-party CRM system.
engagements.agentNotes: Provided integration documentation. Customer working with their dev team to implement.
engagements.transcript: Customer requesting integration guidance for Salesforce CRM...

engagements.aiSummary: Training session for new team members on platform usage.
engagements.agentNotes: Conducted group training session for 8 new users. All participants satisfied with training.
engagements.transcript: Group training session conducted via screen sharing...
